description: This file initializes and renders the main React application component into the DOM. It imports React and ReactDOM, as well as styles and the main App component, then mounts the app into the element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering a React component tree into a DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
